abstract: In person and in a Web video, Mitt Romney keeps jabbing at Gov. Rick Perry and Social Security.
snippet: In person and in a Web video, Mitt Romney keeps jabbing at Gov. Rick Perry and Social Security.
lead_paragraph: THE VILLAGES, Fla. - The audience - the aging, the retired and the lively-but-starting-to-show-smile-lines men and women of Florida - could not have telegraphed Social Security concerns more clearly than Mitt Romney himself, who tried a little Social Security humor of his own Tuesday afternoon at The Villages, a retirement community about an hour north of Orlando.

headline.main: In Florida Retirement Community, Guess What Romney Talks About?
